text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Maruzen, thanks for the other day. 
The peanut butter you gave me was 
real delicious!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Comes in handy for a lot of cooking.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Doesn't it just～? You can eat it 
with bread, or use it as a secret 
ingredient in dishes♪

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah, I even tried using it on 
pasta and it turned out great.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I used it to make carbonara. It did 
end up a bit too sweet, so maybe I should 
add more salt and pepper next time.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
…… Pfft, aha, ahahaha! 
I've never thought of that before!!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I really dig that charming side of yours♪

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Thanks, Maruzen. 
I really appreciate this side of you too.
